Verses: 1 aanaalum, Kadaisi Naatkalil Karththarudaiya Aalayamaagiya Parvadham Parvadhangalin Kodumudiyil Sthaabikkappattu, Malaigalukku Melaai Uyarththappattirukkum, Ellaa Jaadhigalum Adhinidaththirku Odivaruvaargal.

2 thiralaana Jaadhigal Purappattuvandhu: Naam Karththarin Parvadhaththukkum, Yaakkobin Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkum Povom Vaarungal; Avar Thamadhu Vazhigalai Namakkup Podhippaar, Naam Avar Paadhaigalil Nadappomenbaargal; Enenil Seeyonilirundhu Vedhamum, Erusalemilirundhu Karththarin Vasanamum Velippadum.

3 avar Thiralaana Janangalukkul Nyaayantheerththu, Dhooraththilulla Balaththa Jaadhigalaik Kadindhukolluvaar; Appozhudhu Avargal Thangal Pattayangalai Manvettigalaagavum, Thangal Eettigalai Arivaalgalaagavum Adippaargal; Oru Jaadhikku Virodhamaai Marujaadhi Pattayam Eduppadhillai; Ini Avargal Yuththaththaik Karpadhumillai.
4 avanavan Thanthan Dhraatchachchediyin Nizhalilum, Thanthan Aththimaraththin Nizhalilum Bayappaduththuvaar Illaamal Utkaaruvaan; Senaigaludaiya Karththarinvaai Idhai Sollitru.

5 sagala Janangalum Thangal Thangal Dhevanudaiya Naamaththaip Patrikkondu Nadappaargal; Naangalum Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththaip Patrikkondu Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Nadappom.
6 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Annaalile Naan Nondiyaanavalai Serththu, Thallundavalaiyum Theengu Anubaviththavalaiyum Koottikkondu,

7 nondiyaanavalai Meedhiyaana Janamaagavum, Dhooramaaith Thallunduponavalai Balaththa Jaadhiyaagavum Vaippen; Avargalperil Karththar Seeyon Parvadhaththile Idhu Mudhal Endrendraikkum Raajaavaayiruppaar.
8 mandhaiyin Thurukkame, Seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Arane, Mundhina Aalugai Unnidaththil Varum; Raajarigam Erusalem Kumaaraththiyinidaththil Varum.
9 ippodhum Nee Saththamittuk Kadharuvaanen? Raajaavaanavar Unnidaththil Illaiyo? Un Aalosanaikkaarar Azhindhuponaargalo? Prasavikkira Sthreekku Oththa Vedhanai Unakku Undaagum.

10 seeyon Kumaaraththiye, Prasava Sthreeyaippola Ambaayappattu Vedhanaippadu; Nee Ippodhu Nagaraththilirundhu Purappattu, Veligalil Thangi Baabilon Varaikkum Povaai. Ange Viduvikkappaduvaai; Ange Karththar Unnai Un Saththurukkalin Kaikku Neengalaakki Meetpaar.
11 seeyon Theettuppaduvaalaaga, Engal Kan Avalaik Kaanbadhaaga Endru Solli, Anega Jaadhiyaar Unakku Virodhamaagak Koodiyirukkiraargal.
12 aanaalum Avargal Karththarudaiya Ninaivugalai Ariyaamalum, Avarudaiya Yosanaiyai Unaraamalum Irukkiraargal; Avar Arikkattugalaippola Avargalaik Kalaththile Serppaar.

13 seeyon Kumaaraththiye, Nee Ezhundhu Poradi; Naan Un Kombugalai Irumbum, Un Kulambugalai Vengalamumaakkuven; Nee Anega Janangalai Norukkippoduvaai; Avargal Thedi Serththadhai Nee Karththarukkendrum, Avargaludaiya Aasthiyai Boomikkellaam Aandavaraayirukkiravarukkendrum Niyamippaai.
